name: Delicious Minty Bean Soup
desc: A rich soup made with simple ingredients. The smooth texture caresses your taste buds, filling your mouth with the refreshing scent of beans and mints. The unadorned yet pleasant flavor reminds you of a leisurely walk in the shade. Who can refuse such simple delight?

customize.name: Recipe: Minty Bean Soup
customize.desc: A detailed step-by-step recipe for making Minty Bean Soup.

customize.name: Glabrous Beans
customize.desc: A common legume in Teyvat with a light aroma. It can be prepared in a variety of ways, and is thus widely accepted by people all over the world.

customize.name: Mint
customize.desc: A refreshingly cool ingredient. The cool, fresh flavor can cut through the heat of many dishes.

customize.name: Minty Bean Soup
customize.desc: A rich soup made with simple ingredients. Mints and beans were boiled and ground together to get a smooth texture. The soup was then left on low heat till it thickened. Finally, some beans and mints were sprinkled on the top. This refreshing delicacy tastes equally good whether served hot or cold.

customize.name: Suspicious Minty Bean Soup
customize.desc: A rich soup made with simple ingredients. Due to an excess of water, the soup tastes more like a beverage than a proper dish. Why not add some ice and turn it into a bowl of Minty Bean Water, then?

value.text: Revives a character and restores 150 HP.
